      • addElement

        public void addElement(Element element)
        Adds an Element to the centre of this Layouter. If the element has a variable and the layouter does not then the layouter will take on the element variable and vice-versa.
        Parameters:
        element - an Element that is added to this Layouter

      • addElement

                       java.lang.String location)

        Parameters:
        element - an Element that is added to this Layouter
        location - a String constant denoting the location of the supplied element

      • setSize

        public void setSize(int width,
                    int height)
        Overrides the Element method to compensate for differences between the desired size of components and the size of the whole Item. The given parameters refer to the desired size of components and not to the size of this Item, which will be slightly bigger, depending on the setting for spacing on the parent BorderPanel.
        Overrides:
        setSize in class Element
        Parameters:
        width - the int representing width of the component
        height - the int representing height of the component
